mapper.select: SELECT mc.class_cover, tn.nick_name AS teacher_name, hn.nick_name AS headmaster_name, mc.class_name, mc.class_type, mc.start_time, mc.finish_time, mc.finish, mc.remark FROM ms_class mc LEFT JOIN sys_user tn ON mc.teacher_id = tn.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user hn ON mc.headmaster_id = hn.user_id WHERE mc.del_flag = 0

SELECT mc.class_cover AS clazz_cover, tn.nick_name AS teacher_name, hn.nick_name AS headmaster_name, mc.class_name AS clazz_name, mc.class_type AS clazz_type, mc.start_time, mc.finish_time, mc.finish, mc.remark FROM ms_class mc JOIN sys_user AS tn ON mc.teacher_id = tn.user_id JOIN sys_user AS hn ON mc.headmaster_id = hn.user_id
AND mc.teacher_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sys_user WHERE nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teacherName}, '%'))
AND mc.headmaster_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sys_user WHERE nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{headmasterName}, '%'))
AND class_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clazzName}, '%')
AND start_time = #{startTime} AND finish_time = #{finishTime} AND finish = #{finish}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_class(class_id, teacher_id, headmaster_id, class_name, class_cover, class_type, start_time, finish_time, finish, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{clazzId}, #{teacherId}, #{headmasterId}, #{clazzName}, #{clazzCover}, #{clazzType}, #{startTime}, #{finishTime}, #{finish}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT mc.class_cover AS clazz_cover, tn.nick_name AS teacher_name, hn.nick_name AS headmaster_name, mc.class_name AS clazz_name, mc.class_type AS clazz_type, mc.start_time, mc.finish_time, mc.finish, mc.remark FROM ms_class mc LEFT JOIN sys_user tn ON mc.teacher_id = tn.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user hn ON mc.headmaster_id = hn.user_id WHERE mc.class_id = #{clazzId}
SELECT chapter_id, chapter_name FROM ms_chapter class_id = #{clazzId} ORDER BY chapter_sort DESC
SELECT catalogue_name FROM ms_catalogue chapter_id = #{chapterId} ORDER BY catalogue_sort DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_chapter(chapter_id, class_id, chapter_name, chapter_sort, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{chapterId}, #{clazzId}, #{chapterName}, #{chapterSort}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO ms_catalogue(catalogue_id, chapter_id, catalogue_name, catalogue_sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{catalogueId}, #{chapterId}, #{catalogueName}, #{catalogueSort}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
